User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111005 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111005130150

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open two Firefox windows
2. Start dragging a tab on one window
3. Alt + Tab to the second window
4. try moving your mouse fast to one direction, now the preview lost it's mouse capture


Actual results:

The preview lost it's mouse capture


Expected results:

The preview should keep the mouse capture even after Alt + Tab
